00016 #include "RCIncoming.h"
00017 
00018 #include <TTEScheduler.h>
00019 
00020 namespace TTEthernetModel {
00021 
00022 Define_Module(RCIncoming);
00023 
00024 
00025 RCIncoming::RCIncoming() : Incoming::Incoming()
00026 {
00027     lastArrived=0;
00028 }
00029 
00030 void RCIncoming::handleMessage(cMessage *msg)
00031 {
00032     if(msg->arrivedOn("in")){
00033         TTEScheduler *tteScheduler = (TTEScheduler*)getParentModule()->getSubmodule("tteScheduler");
00034         unsigned long currentTotalTicks = tteScheduler->getTotalTicks();
00035         //Now check for correct arrival:
00036         //TODO what todo with JITTER?
00037         //Check too early
00038         if(currentTotalTicks-lastArrived < bag){
00039             emit(ctDroppedSignal, 1);
00040             if(ev.isGUI()){
00041                 ev.printf("Received frame in %s too early! Gap was %d Ticks, should have been between minimum %d! \n", getName(), currentTotalTicks-lastArrived,par("bag").longValue());
00042                 bubble("Frame to early");
00043                 getDisplayString().setTagArg("i2", 0, "status/excl3");
00044                 getParentModule()->getDisplayString().setTagArg("i2", 0, "status/excl3");
00045             }
00046 
00047             delete msg;
00048         }
00049         //Timing ok
00050         else{
00051             lastArrived=currentTotalTicks;
00052             sendDelayed(msg,SimTime(getParentModule()->par("hardware_delay").doubleValue()),"out");
00053             //send(msg,"out");
00054         }
00055     }
00056 }
00057 
00058 void RCIncoming::handleParameterChange(const char* parname){
00059     bag = (unsigned long)par("bag").longValue();
00060 }
00061
